metadata.title: Wednesday, 7th October, 2015
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    when the Pave Zambia 2000 Project will be extended to Mpongwe District; and
(b)    if the project will not be extended to the District, why.
(a)    what has caused the delay in completing Phase I of the construction works of Milenge District Hospital;
(b)    when the works will be completed;
(c)    when the completed Phase II of the Hospital will be opened; and
(d)    when works under Phase III will commence.
(a)    when construction of a maternity wing at Mwimba Health Post in Lumezi Parliamentary Constituency will commence;
(b)    what has caused the delay in commencing the project;
(c)    what the cost of the project is; and
(d)    what the time-frame for completing the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Commerce, Trade and Industry
parts: (a)    whether the Government has any plans to decentralize the operations of the Competition and Consumer Protection Commission to all the provinces;
(c)    how the Commission implements its programmes in rural areas and other districts where it has no offices.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    what benefits the Zambian Government derives from the contract with Japan Export Vehicles Inspection Centre (JEVIC) which is responsible for inspecting used motor vehicles imported from Japan;
(b)    how much money, from the contract, on average per annum, is realised by the Zambian Government;
(c)    who signed the contract with JEVIC on behalf of the Zambian Government; and

(d)    what the tenure of the contract is. ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Thanks - His Excellency the President’s Address - Motion (22nd September) - Resumption of Debate - (The Deputy Minister for Copperbelt Province).
